role.unArmoredDefense:
Unarmored Defense: While you are not wearing any armor, 
 your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.
 You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

background.tools:
This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks,
 a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. 
 Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.
